task.title: How to make a Long Island
task.shortdesc: A very common drink to make as a bartender is a Long Island Ice Tea, which consists of five different kinds of liquor.

context.p: Knowing how to make a Long Island will help you be on your way to a bartender.

step.cmd: Gather the ingredients for the drink.
Setup mixing glass and tin, put small amount of ice in mixing glass.
Pour one part of gin, vodka, tequila, rum in any order..
Add two part sweet and sour.
Put mixing tin on the glass, then shake drink.
Strain drink into ice filled serving glass.
Add a lemon as a garish and a straw.
